page.title: 17Home Life and Leisure
page.content: {The Family Unit}is still basically the traditional 2 parents and children.The size of the unit is smaller than it was in earlier times,partly because of more efficient birth control.On the whole,the families in the area hold to the old ways and conventions i.e.enga- gements,marriages,births and annivers- aries are still occasions for formal acknowledgement and celebration. Most} homes have such{modern appliances}as fridges,washing machines,electric coo kers,televisions,radios,freezers,stere o units and videos,motor mowers,etc.Ho me computers are increasing in number. {Indoor Leisure}activities include tel- evision viewing,reading,videos,music, entertaining,playing games,both board and computers and listening to the ra dio.{Outdoor activities}include walki- ng,fishing,swimming,hunting and shoot- ing.Leisure Centres are very popular.
